sentences.en: a blue pencil
sentences.cn: 蓝色铅笔

sentences.en: a lot of the outlines had been pencilled in.
sentences.cn: 很多草图已经用铅笔填好了。

sentences.en: a pencil sketch
sentences.cn: 铅笔速写

sentences.en: a sharp pencil
sentences.cn: 尖尖的铅笔

sentences.en: Fill in gaps by using short, upward strokes of the pencil.
sentences.cn: 用铅笔向上短短地勾画几道来填充空白。

sentences.en: Give me that pencil.
sentences.cn: 把那支铅笔递给我。

sentences.en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentences.cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

sentences.en: Have a pencil and notepad ready.
sentences.cn: 准备好铅笔和笔记本。

sentences.en: He had written her a note in pencil.
sentences.cn: 他用铅笔给她写了个便条。

sentences.en: He made marks with a pencil.
sentences.cn: 他用铅笔做了记号。

sentences.en: He picked up a pencil and toyed with it idly.
sentences.cn: 他捡起一支铅笔，无所事事地摆弄着。

sentences.en: He pulled the stub of a pencil from behind his ear.
sentences.cn: 他从耳后拿出一小段铅笔头。

sentences.en: I'll get a pencil and paper.
sentences.cn: 我去拿铅笔和纸。

sentences.en: Mary suggests using a neutral lip pencil.
sentences.cn: 玛丽建议用浅色唇线笔。

sentences.en: May 15 was pencilled in as the date for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 暂定5月15日作开会的日期。

sentences.en: Ridley picked up a pencil and fiddled with it.
sentences.cn: 里德利拿起一支铅笔，不停地在手里摆弄着。

sentences.en: She can't write yet, but she loves to scribble with a pencil.
sentences.cn: 她现在还不会写字, 但她喜欢用铅笔乱涂.

sentences.en: the stump of a pencil
sentences.cn: 铅笔头

sentences.en: This pencil's blunt !
sentences.cn: 这支铅笔不尖了！

sentences.en: With a lip pencil, outline lips and fill them in.
sentences.cn: 用唇线笔勾出双唇的轮廓，然后涂上唇膏。

phrases.tran_cn: 蓝铅笔（用于删改书稿或剧本等的）
n. 测电笔，电笔；试验笔

trans.tran_cn: 铅笔，彩色铅笔，笔状物，画风，画法，[物]光线锥
trans.tran_en: an instrument that you use for writing or drawing, consisting of a wooden stick with a thin piece of a black or coloured substance in the middle
an instrument that you use for writing or drawing, consisting of a wooden stick with a thin piece of a black or coloured substance in the middle
to write something or make a mark with a pencil
